column5: I had to take advantage of the awesome cool weather yesterday. Took my little guy fishing by the park right by our house. We were fishing with worms on bobbers. He got 4 largemouth and he caught his biggest ever largemouth. We got a ton of bluegill too, but they were not as fun as the largies! He was so excited and there were lots of screams of excitement! He was telling everybody that he was a bass master.
That's great Matt, love the smiles on the little guys face
Awesome fishing with youngsters and your little dude is a winner, Matt!
Time well spent Matt! Congrats to the little man
Ilove seeing pictures of happy young fisher people.
That's one happy fisherman. Good job dad.

i need to start teaching my nephew to fish. So far we have only allowed him to use a weight with no hook because he is a total madman...I wonder if I got him to catch a sun fish on a bobber if it would calm him down enough....
Akrisoner  It does with my son. He gets so excited when we see the bobber go down. I don't have time to use my rod. He takes all my attention.
i see a father and son fly-in soon congrats
Love the little fishing vest haha
